text: Petar Krivokuća (Serbian Cyrillic: Петар Kpивoкућa ;born 12 June 1947 in Rokci village near Ivanjica, Serbia, FPR Yugoslavia) is a Serbian defender who played for SFR Yugoslavia. Krivokuća made 13 Greek first division appearances for Iraklis Thessaloniki F.C. during the 1976-77 season. ==References== ==External links== * Profile on Serbian federation site Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ivanjica Category:Serbian footballers Category:Yugoslav footballers Category:Yugoslavia international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Yugoslav First League players Category:FK Javor Ivanjica players Category:FK Sloboda Užice players Category:FK Obilić players Category:FK Voždovac players Category:Red Star Belgrade footballers Category:Super League Greece players Category:Iraklis Thessaloniki F.C. players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:FC Rouen players Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Petar Krivokuća
